GSD.product_version: versions from v3.3 to before v5.4.225
GSD.description:
HID: hyperv: fix possible memory leak in mousevsc_probe()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.225 by commit e29289d0d8193fca6d2c1f0a1de75cfc80edec00, it was introduced in version v3.3 by commit 74c4fb058083b47571a4f76dcfce95085f2d8098. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: HID: hyperv: fix possible memory leak in mousevsc_probe()
OSV.details:
